title: Introducing Arcade
subtitle: By supersalesagro
description: Embed interactive product demos in your documentation and turn all users into power users.

sections.text: Arcade lets you create interactive product demos in minutes and turn all users into power users. Let users experience your product through interactive, guided demos. No more pausing and rewinding, users can progress at their own pace. This integration allows you to embed Arcade interactive demos into your supersalesagro documentation.

Arcade is a powerful tool for creating interactive product demos. It allows you to create a series of interactive steps that guide users through your product. You can embed these interactive demos directly into your supersalesagro documentation, making it easy for users to learn how to use your product.
Embedding an Arcade flow in your documentation is simple - just paste an Arcade flow link into the supersalesagro editor. The app will turn the link into an Arcade embed showing your recorded demo.
Arcade has revolutionized the way we provide user documentation.
To get started with Arcade, you'll need to create an account and record your first demo. Once you've recorded your demo, you can embed it into your supersalesagro documentation.

To install on a single space navigate to integrations in sub-navigation. If you prefer to install the Arcade integration on multiple or all spaces, navigate to your organization settings and enable it from the integrations panel. This will give you access to the custom arcade block.
